meta.name: Create Atlassian Confluence page from template

parameters.name: title
parameters.value: ={{ $now.format("yyyy-MM-dd-HH-mm") }}-{{ $('Replace placeholders in template body and title').item.json.page_title }}

parameters.name: body
parameters.value: ={{ { "storage" : { "value" : $('Replace placeholders in template body and title').item.json.page_body, "representation" : "storage" } } }}

parameters.content:
## Create Atlassian Confluence page from template

Creates a new page in Confluence from a space template.

### Setup
All parameters you need to change are defined in the _Set parameters_ node
For detailled setup instructions and explanation how it all works --> [ðŸŽ¥ Video](https://www.tella.tv/video/automate-confluence-page-creation-e994)

### Credentials
As the password for the basic auth credential, you need to use an API key. 
Documentation on those is [here](https://support.atlassian.com/atlassian-account/docs/manage-api-tokens-for-your-atlassian-account/).
[Here's](https://id.atlassian.com/manage-profile/security/api-tokens) where you create and manage Atlassian API keys.

nodes.name: Replace placeholders in template body and title
